description:
He is http://anidb.net/ch23266 [Rintarou]`s landlord, who owns a TV repair store beneath his apartment, living with his daughter, http://anidb.net/ch32401 [Nae]. http://anidb.net/ch23266 [Rintarou] often gives him the nickname "Mr Braun" for his passion to Braun tube TV.
Source: wiki
name: Tennouji Yuugo
